en: Gain [color=red]99%[/color] less materials from recyling it
zh: 回收道具时额外获得[color=red]-99%[/color]个材料

en: [color=#00ff00]5[/color] hits taken are nullified every wave
zh: 在每一波敌袭中会抵消受到的[color=#00ff00]前5次[/color]攻击伤害

en: [color=#00ff00]8[/color] hits taken are nullified every wave
zh: 在每一波敌袭中会抵消受到的[color=#00ff00]前8次[/color]攻击伤害

en: You can only equip two weapons at a time
zh: 同时只能装备两把武器

en: All damage types are linked ([color=#00ff00]2 Melee Damage[/color] = [color=#00ff00]1 Ranged Damage[/color] = [color=#00ff00]1 Elemental Damage[/color] = [color=#00ff00]2 Engineering[/color])
zh: 所有的伤害类型都是相连的（[color=#00ff00]2近战伤害[/color] = [color=#00ff00]1远程伤害[/color] = [color=#00ff00]1元素伤害[/color] = [color=#00ff00]2工程学[/color]）

en: Map Size stops increasing at Wave 20
zh: 第20波敌袭后地图尺寸停止增长
